response.overview: Argyris. a successful printer, he is in love with Lela, the daughter of Mr. Stelios, who both believe in money. When his boss dies and leaves him an inheritance of the printing press, Argyris asks Lela to marry him. But her father asks the groom to have money... a lot of money. Argyris' troubles begin after he accepts the proposal of Lazarus, a guy from the piazza, to make a lot of money easily...
response.title: O paraharaktis
